name: Stone and Contracts
title: Contract of Eons Unshaken
desc: "This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

skills.desc:
When the Action Phase of the next Round begins: Create 3 Omni Element and draw 1 card.
(You must have at least 2 Liyue characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
